title: Jump Finance - Paid Software Intern
bodyText: Jump Finance provides loans for students in Ghana by working with universities.
Solo-built an application for 900 students to afford university using ReactJS, NodeJS, and MySQL.

title: Aspiring Students Directed Research (ASDRP) - Student Researcher
bodyText: Research on reducing trial time of FDA-approved drugs using weighted score analysis with Python.
Presented at Southern California Conferences for Undergraduate Research.
